trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of floating-point x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.

To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> class with the specified coordinates.
The horizontal position of the point.
The vertical position of the point.
Translates a given <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
The that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of pt.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Translates a given <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by a specified <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
The that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of pt.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Represents a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> class with member data left uninitialized.
Specifies whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> contains the same coordinates as the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to test.
This method returns `true` if obj is a and has the same coordinates as this .
Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure.
An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure.
Gets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> is empty.
`true` if both <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF.X"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF.Y"></xref> are 0; otherwise, `false`.
Translates the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=fullName>
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> that specifies the numbers to add to the x- and y-coordinates of the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
A that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of pt.
Returns the translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.

The result specifies whether the values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF.X"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF.Y"></xref> properties of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures are equal.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to compare.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to compare.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF.X"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF.Y"></xref> values of the left and right <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether the coordinates of the specified points are not equal.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to compare.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to compare.
`true` to indicate the and values of left and right are not equal; otherwise, `false`.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by the negative of a given <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
The that specifies the numbers to subtract from the coordinates of pt.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by the negative of a specified <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Subtraction%2A> operator subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size from the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> from the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=fullName>
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
The that specifies the numbers to subtract from the coordinates of pt.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by the negative of a specified size.

The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> method subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the specified size from the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> from the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
The that specifies the numbers to subtract from the coordinates of pt.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> by the negative of a specified size.

The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> method subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size from the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> from the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to translate.
The that specifies the numbers to subtract from the coordinates of pt.
The translated <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> to a human readable string.
A string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Gets or sets the x-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
The x-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
Gets or sets the y-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
The y-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>.
